attributes.action: put pressure on the food industry to make packets of Pringles bigger.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alack - for we Pringleophiles suffer at regular intervals.  For upon consuming a packet of Pringles, we consume all of these potato chips before our hunger is truly satisfied! 
Surely the populace would rejoice anew were Pringle packets more capacious, and therein filled with more of that which currently inhabits it!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
